statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.title) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.RequestID , AA.uid , AA.agency_uid , AA.brand_uid , AA.title , AA.marketing , AA.active_date_start , AA.active_date_end , AA.notice
, AA.RequestID , BB.Status , BB.RequestDate
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsLookbook AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsRequest BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.RequestID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.RequestID = #RequestID#
AND AA.agency_uid = #AgencyUid#
AND AA.brand_uid = #BrandUid#
AND ( AA.title LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsLookbook AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsLookbook AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.uid = #uid#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TSmapsLookbook ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, RequestID, uid, agency_uid, brand_uid, title, marketing, active_date_start, active_date_end, notice ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #RequestID#, #uid#, #agency_uid#, #brand_uid#, #title#, #marketing#, #active_date_start#, #active_date_end#, #notice# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsLookbook SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, RequestID = #RequestID# , uid = #uid# , agency_uid = #agency_uid# , brand_uid = #brand_uid# , title = #title# , marketing = #marketing# , active_date_start = #active_date_start# , active_date_end = #active_date_end# , notice = #notice# WHERE ID = #ID#
